PKGMAN-DSEARCH(1) General Commands Manual PKGMAN-DSEARCH(1)

NAME

pkgman-dsearch — search the packages sources directories for package name and description

SYNOPSIS

pkgman dsearch [-v | -vv] [--path] [--regex] expr

DESCRIPTION

Search the packages sources directories for expr in packages' name and description. It looks in all directories specified in /etc/pkgman.conf as “pkgsrcdir” argument.

The options are as follows:

-v
Show package version in the listing.
-vv
Show package version and description in the listing.
--path
Show package source path in the listing.
--regex
Interpret expr as regular expression.
expr
Search names and descriptions for expr, where the expression may be the string or regex in regex(3) format.

EXIT STATUS

0
Success.
255
Nothing found.
September 9, 2023 Zeppe-Lin
